email_body: ---------------------- Forwarded by John Arnold/HOU/ECT on 09/27/2000 11:12 AM --------------------------- From: Margaret Allen@ENRON on 09/27/2000 08:24 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Commercials So, what did you think?! Don't lie or stretch the truth either -- you won't hurt my feelings, I promise. By the way, by the time I arrived home it was completely dark so I went for a three mile run this morning. Not fun, but I'm definitely awake right now! BUT, it's all your fault I couldn't go last night....he!he! Trade well, MSA
